job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongWhat we dostrongppUptake is the premier Industrial AI company providing a predictive analytics SaaS platform that empowers major industry leaders to optimize performance reduce asset failures and enhance safety At Uptake we combine our strengths  machine learning analytics data visualization and software development  to deliver actionable insights that make industry more reliable productive safe and secureppstrongWhat Data Scientists Do HerenbspstrongppData science is at the core of what we do at Uptake We collaborate with customers engineering product and other teams to contribute insights and data science best practices to all parts of the businessppTypical day to day tasks for a data scientist might includepulliCollaborating with sales and customers to analyze problems and assess needsliliData readiness assessments for customersliliLearning a new programming language or data science technique  we continually build our skills and explore new thingsliliBuilding testing and deploying supervised or unsupervised learning modelsliliWriting data analysis reports for internal useliliBuilding tools to enable other data scientists to scale their knowledge and increase impactliliWorking with customers to develop analyses that help them solve business problems and drive valueliliBuilding and deploying models to cloud based solutions for customersliliPresenting exploratory and modeling results to a customerliulpWhat We Are Looking ForpulliBachelors degree or higher in a relevant fieldlili35 years experience preferably in an analytical and client facing roleliliPassion for data science We want candidates who love data science and are excited about what they doliliSome ways previous successful candidates have demonstrated this are bynbspliliWriting relevant blog posts andor articlesliliParticipating in relevant online communitiesliliExpressing detailed knowledge of and genuine interest in Uptakes unique methods products data and technology within a cover letterliliAbility to write sophisticated machine learning and data analysis code in Python or RliliSome ways previous successful candidates have demonstrated this are bynbspnbspliliContributing to influential Open Source Projects like sklearn XGBoost tidyverse Tensorflow pytorch Kafka Spark Elasticsearch etcliul
